description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. A horror adventure game like no other on XBLIG. Contains psychological horror, jarring motion capture frames and intense jump scares. Play with the lights off and volume up!
